data.eml:eml: Synonymic notes on some species of Chironomidae (Diptera) described by Dr. M. Sasa (†)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kobayashi, Tadashi, Endo, Kazuo (2008): Synonymic notes on some species of Chironomidae (Diptera) described by Dr. M. Sasa (†). Zootaxa 1712: 49-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180948
